description: This spiced sticky toffee pudding cooks gently in the slow cooker for an oozing and delicious result.
keywords: Spiced Slow Cooker Sticky Toffee Pudding
name: Spiced Slow Cooker Sticky Toffee Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the dish into the slow cooker, set on low. Pour in enough boiling water to reach halfway up the side of the dish. Cook for 7 hours. Tip on to a serving plate and pour over the remaining toffee sauce.
